tool.name: mtbls520_05a_import_maf
tool.description: Import MAF file from the MTBLS520 study.
tool.help: This is the computational workflow to study the seasonal variation of secondary metabolites in nine different bryophytes. ---- Module: Import MAF Description: Import MAF file from the MTBLS520 study. Input parameters: - Input Preprocess Rdata file - Input study MAF file: MAF file containing the feature matrix of the MTBLS520 study Output parameters: - Preprocess Rdata file: Please connect this Rdata file to the ecological characteristics module of the MTBLS520 workflow. ---- For updates and documentation, please visit: https://github.com/korseby/container-mtbls520
